content: When trying to get all the available IGs, using FilesystemPackageCacheManager#listAllIds (https://github.com/hapifhir/org.hl7.fhir.core/blob/master/org.hl7.fhir.utilities/src/main/java/org/hl7/fhir/utilities/npm/FilesystemPackageCacheManager.java#L457), "temporary" (aka manually added) packages are referenced using ID and Canonical as a key/value pair. However, packages from packages.fhir.org are referenced using ID and URL (in listSpecs). Would it be possible/desirable to switch listSpecs over to listing Canonicals instead?
Please give me actual examples of what the output looks like now, and what you want it to look like and I will investigate. @Michael O'Keefe
